privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Runa Kani, we value your privacy. This policy explains what we collect, why we collect it, and your rights under the EU GDPR and Peru‚Äôs Law No. 29733.
privacy.collectText: We collect: (a) name/username and email to create and manage your account; (b) minimal session data to keep your access secure (authentication and single‚Äësession control); (c) geolocation coordinates only in emergency scenarios you initiate. We do not access Contacts, Camera, or Photo Gallery. Your PIN is stored locally on your device (not sent to our servers). We do not use Google Maps APIs.
privacy.useText: We use your data to: (a) provide secure access; (b) process reports, including sending emergency coordinates when applicable; (c) send transactional/administrative emails (e.g., verification, security alerts). We do not sell your data.
privacy.rightsText: You may request access, rectification, erasure, objection, or restriction, and withdraw consent. To exercise your rights, contact us at {contactEmail}. Data is hosted on Firebase/Google Cloud with international transfers under adequate safeguards. We retain data only as long as needed to provide the service and meet legal obligations.
